Emmet was a commoner and the father of Gabe from the Rivington district of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Like his son, Emmet was a human with raven-black hair and dark eyes.
In the , Emmet and his son set out to watch a performance by a beloved clown â€“ Dribbles of the Circus of the Last Days. Emmet welcomed a short distraction from the Absolute crisis, but due to the recently skyrocketed crime and unrest, the circus gates were guarded by wood elf Klaus and his trained ghoul partner Benji, who sniffed out blood on the hands of the guests. Gabe, however, was afraid of the undead monster and hesitated to enter.
